issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add example for RESTful SQL query service
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4795](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4795). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I built a simple RESTful server using Rocket that allows SQL queries to be executed using DataFusion. This might be a nice thing to include in the project as an example.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4795?focusedCommentId=16948120) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Closing this since it is not really part of the scope of Arrow/DataFusion.
